TopicTitle: Awesome game play, but I have a problem!

Articles.Content:
I posted recently about a new way I've been playing.. I start with electric generation, full steel structurals, and drilling capabilities but NO FUEL!.. I use KSP foundries, infernal robotics, KAS KIS, and EPL.. SO I start by finding a good place for a new base.. I build land rovers, paddle boats, etc,etc to get an EPL launchpad set up there. then I start drilling for fuel and rocketparts, etc.... I basically build my own base elsewhere.. The only time I have to ever switch to KSC is to unlock new parts, and (unfortunately) recruit new kerbals.. then fly them to the new base, etc,etc... I need a new UP-to-date mod that allows for kerbal breeding/population SO i can set up a breeding ground near my new base and have kerbals for the ships I build instead of using the KSC all the time... Does anyone know of any??!!!!

Edited January 8, 2016 by Talavar

There is a mod called civilian population, but it is broken in 1.0.5 sadly  

Link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/111815-104civilian-population-1751-update-101215/&page=1

49 minutes ago, Whizzkid said:

There is a mod called civilian population, but it is broken in 1.0.5 sadly  

Link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/111815-104civilian-population-1751-update-101215/&page=1

Already checked it out, and yep it needs an update.
